pages.title: Advanced Alloy
pages.text: Advanced Alloy is mix of Titanium, Aluminum and Chrome, and an alternative to Netherite.$(br)Tools and armor forged out of this material are more durable than diamond, but not as strong or fast.$(br2)DURABILITY: $(l)EXCEPTIONAL$()$(br)MINING SPEED: $(l)9$()$(br)ATTACK DAMAGE: $(l)7$()$(br)ENCHANTABILITY: $(l)HIGH
To obtain tools and armor made out of Advanced Alloy, one must be smith Titanium gear with an Advanced Alloy Ingot.
